sub_title: Business Development Manager with Technical Expertise in Cryofree Dilution Refrigerator (ULT)
summary:
A technical sophisticated professional having 12+years' experience in Business Development and Managing the customer support function of Ultra-Low-Temperature Cryogenic systems, High Field Superconducting Magnets, Plasma Etching & Deposition System in the field of Nanoscience and having excellent customer service attitude and the ability to interact with customers in a professional manner with excellent planning and decision-making skills.
With details-oriented approach along with strong analytical and relationship-building skills ensured that all services related activities are performed in an efficient, timely and professional manner and provided the satisfactory resolution to customer’s inquiries & challenges within company policies. 
Able to work under pressure to accomplish overall objectives using well developed analytical and “trouble shooting” skills. Build rapport easily with clients, able to lead and manage an effective team being resourceful.

profile_positions.description:
Being resourceful with extensive cryogenic experience of ultra-low temperature dilution refrigerator and as a part of the sales & Marketing team while working closely with our R & D team to make an impressive microwave performance and unparalleled flexibility Cryo-Flex low-temperature cable. I am working on products to provide the optimal cryogenic microwave solution for quantum applications like:
Quantum Computing
Quantum computing architecture creates stringent requirements on I/O for qubit control.
Quantum Internet
Quantum internet research is developing rapidly and requires a growing number of SNSPD I/O channels.
These multi-channel flexible cryogenic cables are dedicated to quantum communication applications.
STM & SPM
Scanning probes and moving stage experiments at low temperatures have been waiting for ultra-thin cables with excellent RF and cryogenic properties.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Being in this highly specialized position of Sr. Engineer, ultra-low temperature (mK) Dilution Refrigerator I used my expertise in ultra-low temperature (mK) Dilution Refrigerator, to oversee and provide ongoing maintenance of these complex systems throughout USA & Asia Pacific.
I helped to Identify business opportunities and develop strategies for achieving business objectives in the North American market.
In performing my day-to-day duties in the US, I oversee the following: -
•Ensure the customer is aware at all times of the correct method to obtain basic results, basic safety, and care of these highly sophisticated systems.
•Troubleshoot and repair all assigned systems to the appropriate level, ensuring that the system is returned to full operation in accordance with its performance specifications.
Client Liaison:
•Communicated with customers regarding the status of repair on their system, in a timely manner.  
•Promote a positive image of Oxford Instruments. 
Advise customers on the availability of Oxford instrumentation related options, upgrades, and support contracts.  Keep the customer up to date and satisfied.
Field Reporting:
•Initiate Field Service Reports for each customer visit/repair in order to document customer problems and the resolution of those problems.  Provide data for installations, warranty, and customer/instrument history.
•Submit in a timely manner all reports including but not limited to (Installation, Service, Schedule, expenses) and information on recurring or potential problems. 
Marketing and Business Development:
•Work closely with local sales representatives and agents to promote future sales, while understanding and maintaining customer satisfaction.   
•Assist in knowledge transfer by training customers on product operation when required.  Assist in training other OI employees when required.
•Works with local Field Engineers, Technical Support and Product Support Specialists to resolve technical problems.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Engineer -Dilution Refrigerator, Oxford Instruments, USA & Asia Pacific
Territory Sales and Service Manager-  Nanoscience India

profile_positions.description:
•	Effectively planned and orchestrated all operations of the technical services to ensure that customers consistently received high quality service and support.
•	Acted as escalation point for troubleshooting advanced Cryogenic systems issues and for resolving complex and urgent customer service incidents while maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction.
•	Serve as point of escalation for Global customers to resolve highly complex problems and collaborate with other departments as necessary to expedite resolution
•	Maintained accurate and complete records regarding incidents, status, and resolutions. Followed up with customers to confirm proper resolution and satisfaction.
•	Identify business opportunities and develop strategies for achieving business objectives
•	Identify and drive new initiatives to improve performance and efficiency of service and support.
•	Demonstrated executive characteristics such as high integrity, honesty, leadership, trust worthiness, goal oriented, and deadline conscious while resolving all escalated customer issues efficiently and effectively to the satisfaction of customer and within company policies
•	First team member of Service team for startup the Direct business operations of Oxford Instruments UK in India and responsible for service business all-over India. 
•	Contributed in achievement of the sales target of by supporting sales team with presales activities.
•	Management, support and performance of services and inclusive of installation and activities like system maintenance, repair and upgrades, maintenance contracts for all over India as well as worldwide.
•	Always build rapport with Clients and provided the satisfactory resolution to their inquiries or complaints within company policies.
profile_positions.title: Area Manager- Customer Support India

profile_positions.description:
• Completed Installation of different models of Oxford Instruments plasma like Reactive Ion Etch (RIE) and Plasma Enhanced Chemical Vapour Deposition (PECVD). 
• Completed Installation of different models of Agilent Technologies  like Single Crystal XRD System. 
• Managed all service related issues of products of the Oxford Instruments plc & Agilent Technologies in India.
• Modified the Instruments at Customer Site if required as per customer applications. 
• Analyzed & Rectified problems related to Instrument within the facility to an acceptable standard in a timely and safe manner.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Engineer
